Fire
One of the Elements of the Goddess Chaos, symbolized by the Sceptre. Fire is the Element of change and passion, the source of rebellion, violence, and impulse. You're a wild, free soul, and you dislike having any sort of direction imposed upon your life. You prefer to take chances and embrace risks, trusting in your pride and wit to get you through. Others may find you brash and careless, but most will see you as independent and indomitable.

You know how sometimes a person can get overwhelmed with a feeling of familiarity?  Yesterday I was in constant familiarity hypnosis.  In my opinion, what triggered my overwhelming deja-vu was the fact that it was a cooler day;  We opened all the windows letting the cool breeze in to keep the apartment at a good temperature.  I truly am a nature nut, because yesterday's "windows all open" was like heaven for me.  I could smell the trees, grass, flowers, and dirt...and if felt like home in my spirit.  It was a really good day.  It reminded me of back home.  During this time of year is when we have the end of the heat BBQs. These are where we all hang outside and eat/drink till the sun starts to fall down for the night. We all go back inside to talk and socialize and before you realize it your skin is covered in goose bumps.  Goosebumps from the chill of the breeze from the open windows and patio door.  That was when I really felt the happiest yesterday.  I remember back when I was first starting high school and made friends for life.  This time of year always seems to be the most memorable time for me.  All through high school,(from summer till fall) my friends and I would have big, bon fire get-togethers out in Finely or at a friends house.  When it would get closer to fall, the bon fire get-togethers would get very chilly... you would practically stand IN the fire just to stay warm.  Those were the days...  Things were so simple then.... so carefree.  Sometimes I wish I could be able to re-live the happiest moments of my life over and over, without changing a thing.  I miss the days of "Extreming" and doing all the crazy JackAss stunts/the crap that we would take part in doing for fun.  Those times are so dear to me.  Now I am making new memories.  I still can't believe it's already 2004, soon to be 2005.  Feels like it should still be the year 2000....even 1997 seems like it was just yesterday.  Time really is just fleeting.  Seven years ago, if you had asked me where I was going to be in the year 2004, the answer you would have recieved would not have been the same as the reality I know today.   For example: Never in my life have I ever thought I would live in the state of Florida.... but here I am... living in Florida.  It's really mind-boggling to think about how we as people know nothing of what is to come.  
We have no control, yet we do have control.  Life is chaos.  Everyday we live in a world where every living thing has choice.  That is where the control comes from.  We have control over the immediate decisions or choices we make for ourselves at any given point in time.  NO control is when we are put into situations where you have no sway over what other people are giong to choose to do, therefore they refuse to bend to your  will.  The fact is... Every person has the ability to say yes... the ability to say no.  When given the CHOICE, no person can make another do anything they don't want to do. (I understand certain situations are out of one's power of choice)  I look at the choices I've made in my life.. the choices I'm making now, and I am happy with the Megan that is the outcome of these choices.  There is no regret hanging around my neck.  The choices we make today are the consenquences of tomorrow.  I realize that this whole rant could be titled as a stoner type rant, but in actuality it is anything but that.  Sometimes I fear I see too much beauty and peace in nature or that I feel too much in general.  No sane person can feel so many feelings and emotions...  Sometimes I wonder when everything is going to come together and make sense.  I shall search for the time of understanding.  Everybody can make thier own choices in life... I personally dissagree with the idea of telling someone what or how they should think, dress, act, etc.  I know that I would not want someone to tell me how I should live my life or what things I should or shouldn't take part it.  That's the beauty of life, choices.   Karma... It's all about Karma.  I know I try to treat everyone as I would like to be treated.  Not enough people have realized that karma is true.  The bottom line is that it all boils straight down to choices.  The ability to make a choice is a freedom that no person or people can ever take away.  I understand that all the choices I've made in my life and the events I've experienced-all have shaped me in to the person I am.  The past is the past.  Now is now. I think back to my days of carfree, wreckless, crazy, extreme, behavior and I smile a slow smile.  I could list the greatest moments of my life all in a span of 7 years... but the core span being 4 years in the middle.  They say highschool is the greatest time of your life... they were right.  Maybe that statement would be false if it were said while I was attending highschool, but it's true now.  I had some amazing friends that I will *NEVER* forget.  There are certain people that have come into and out of my life during the past 5 years that I am so thankful for.  As I sit here reflecting on my most memorable moments, I can't help but become overwhemed with excitement for what is to come in my future.  What will tomorrow bring to me?  Where will I be a year from now?  Who will I love?  Will I still have the same great relationships with my family? Will my friends still be by my side?  I am free in my fear of the future.  I may be anxious, worried, and scared, but at the same time I'm relaxed and at ease with whatever fate decides to blow my way. 
On another note... back to yesterday.... I had fun helping Raquel with the Halloween goodies for her co-workers.  I love Halloween!  Bats, witches, ghosts, spiders, black cats, grave-stones, Oh my!  Last night I had a good time kicking back and watching the "L" word. I'm addicted to that show now.  All I want to do is watch it all the time.  Anyway.... I'm done for today! *wipes brow*

So I woke up around 6:30am... feeling like shit. I hate being sick... it sucks the big one. I'm so tired and have NO energy for anything.. well maybe not anything.. but I am really tired. I want the package that my parents sent to me to get here soon. Outside seems to be getting a little cooler... I have been able to wear jeans without melting, which is nice for a change. My brother's birthday is coming up on the 24th. I need to go back to Hot Topic and buy him a tee shirt. I was thinking the one that said "Your mom has a mullet" or something just as cute. I want to get me some new clothes so bad.... I will just wait forever... like usual. I miss my friends/family/tia soooo much. I can't wait for the holidays to get here! Dude, cookie dough sounds so good right now....

Twenty-five minutes past quitting time 
Seven of us crammed into that truck of mine 
Paying no attention to them highway signs 
Doing ninety miles an hour toward the county line 
Quick sack, twelve pack, back again 
It's a B-double E-double are you in? 
~beer run...
My buddies and their babies letting down their hair 
As long as we're together it don't matter where 
Ain't got a lot of money but we just don't care 
Knowing half the fun is in the getting there 
Aztec, long necks, paychecks spent 
Oh, It's a B-double E-double are you in? 
~beer run...
I can't stop thinking 
What the hell they were drinking 
When they made this county dry 
I got a week-long thirst 
And to make it worse 
Lord, it's my turn to drive 

Laughing and bragging and a' carrying on 
We loaded up the wagons and we headed home 
I guess half a dozen cases doesn't last that long 
Come tomorrow morning it'll be all gone 
Then, it's turn around, leave town, sounds again 
Like a B-double E-double are you in?
~beer run...

You are the Lovers card. The Lovers card is about
union. Each of us carries in our DNA the
ability to be the opposite of what we think we
are. Often our romantic attachments grow out of
awe and respect as we see in another the
characteristics we repress in ourselves.
Society often presses us into molds of what it
thinks masculinity and femininity should be. As
a result, many of us associate with our gender
certain positive characteristics and call
others negative, when if these same qualities
were held by a person of the opposite sex, our
attitude towards them would be reversed.
Getting in touch with our inner animus and
anima, (Jung's terms for our inner male and
female), allows us to see the whole of our
personalities in a positive and constructive
light. When you draw The Lovers card in a
reading, you are working with balancing these
forces. Depending on where the card is, you
have either achieved balance or need to. The
Lovers could indicate a romantic or even a
platonic relationship. Ask yourself is this is
a positive relationship that contributes to
your growth as a complete human being, or if it
fills an emotional craving within you that is
actually detrimental to your personal growth.

Ok, SO yesterday.... I finally got my Wolf~Moon tattoo. I got my ink done, and am so happy now! It took a long time but it was worth it. I didn't cry, nor did I even have the urge to cry. The process felt good actually.... kinda tickled in places.... Don't get me wrong... The parts along my lower spine hurt like a mo-fo. I"m glad that it looks how I wanted it to... and that the guy didn't fuck up. So glad.. YAY! I got my tattoo!
FINALLY!

Man, Florida is rad.  I like it here.. it's very green and pretty.  There are lizards and frogs everywhere you go. The flight here was long, but I didn't die so that is good.  The weather kinda scares me sometimes and I don't care if I sound like a sissy for admitting that.  It's just so unpredictable.  I have never been anywhere close to how it is here.  It's cool in that way.  The time change is still fucked up to me though.  I thought it would shake off after a few days, but it hasn't.  I miss my family, friends, and I miss Adam...oh and my little dog too.  My little Tia!  I have her picture by my bed.lol.  I miss my pup.  I try to talk to Adam as often as I can but that's not very due to the time difference.  I am extremely intent on keeping in touch with all my friends back home.  I will NOT lose my friends because I am choosing to be in Florida at this point in my life.  I'm glad I came out here.  My mom wrote me an email yesterday all about how she misses me and is proud of me.  Yeah right!  Anyway.  I wrote Adam a letter and drew some more art for him, I plan to send it out on monday since I didn't get it out today.  We didn't end up driving to North Carolina this weekend, which was a downer but it's all good.  That's all for now.  I hate trying to update after such a long time.

FOR THOSE OF YOU THAT DIDN'T KNOW... NOW YOU DO.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Dearest Erin... AKA Gangrenous Twat,
I can't believe that our how ever many years friendship is now over cause your just a selfish person. I just can't understand how you can justify what you did...or shall I say what you didn't do. Thank you so much for being there.  Thank you so much for being there for me before I left.  It really meant a lot, oh wait- no you weren't there cause you just didn't give a fuck.  Fuck you and your new "little" bestfriends who are perfect for you: possers, high maitanance hoes, and shallow yuppies.  Your nothing but an ignorant little girl that's just grown up into a complete dirty whore.  At least your sister has her head screwed on right.. she's already ahead of you in life, I mean it's not like she's 14 and having sex. I regret ever knowing you.  I regret ever being with you in any way other than as a "friend" or coworker.  You are just a parasite.  You think your hot and so cool, but in reality your a nobody who is going to be a nobody forever.  You're so naive, Erin.  You paint yourself in this picture that you are a woman of morals and good judgement, but that is an illiusion.  You are just a fat girl who wants everything, but will never be satisfied.  Oh and by the way... you suck at pretty much everything you do...  You want to know why Seth never talked to you again or why you weren't invited to the wedding??? Cause your a skank without any skills in the bedroom.  I never realized how big of a slut you were... until lately.  There is one thing you are actually good at. And you know what that is?  You were always good at getting men to sleep with you.  You get off on stealing unavailable men and for that I look down on you with eyes filled with disgust and pitty.  You are not a friend nor have you ever been.  You don't know how to be a friend.  You don't know the meaning of the word.  You don't know how to communicate and share ideas without getting pissy.  You don't know how to be loyal to your friends.  You don't know how to let temptation pass you by instead of acting on it.  You don't know how to be anything other than an ordinary, self-centered, shallow, materialistic, hoebag.  I feel sorry for you, Erin, because I realize that you don't know anything about the world around you, you are oblivious to it's raw nature and harsh reality.. that is life.  You do not know pain, you do not know financial burden, you do not know how to be thankful for all of what you have.  I'm done with you.  I have known you for who your inner ugly self is for a long time now, but kept my mouth shut... I will not be quiet any longer.  Fuck you Erin... fuck you....and your STDs too.

May you drop off the face of the earth never to be heard from again!

Yours truly,
Megan

"Senility Prayer"
...God grant me... 

The senility to forget the people I never liked 
The good fortune to run into the ones that I do 
And the eyesight to tell the difference." 

--------------------------------------------------
Man, I'm really going to miss everyone here. I can already tell... but I'm super psyched to go away.
Things are changing...
Change is scary,
Change is crazy,
Change is welcomed.

Well, I had a good time visiting my grandparents, uncle, and cousin.  Didn't really do a lot of crazy "you can't believe this" type of stuff.

Now that I'm back home... I have been busy.
  
Brian is mad at me cause I blew him off to go to a party in my name... 
The party was at Andy's house.. It was killer.  I haven't had that much fun in a long time.
Kinda reminded me of the good 'ol' times back in the day. (smile)  If you know me, then you know what happend back in the good 'ol' times so you'd know why I couldn't help but smile.
Soon I'll be off to Florida... who knows when I'll come back to this dust bowl.

Well, my brother leaves with my parents for yellowstone at 6am tomorrow morning.  I'm really sad about my brother leaving... he isn't just my brother, he's my friend.  

So that means I get the house all to my lonesome from saturday to wednesday night... what ever shall I think of to do???

Party perhaps???

*evil grin*

So things are turning up for me.  I'm single again and lookin' for luv.  

Camp this year is going to be AWESOME!  My requests for change have finally gotten through to the board members and now we are going to do things my way- the fun way again at camp!  I feel so special to have so much say in what goes on at camp.  It is a good feeling.. to be needed and what not.

I went shopping today and bought a killer Playboy fitted tee.  My parents even dig it. (who would have thought?) I have been under the spending spree bug and hope it stops soon, so I can still have $$$ for bills.

I have been hanging out a lot with old friends.  It has really felt good to reconnect with my past.  I am going hot-tubing at Andy's with the old crowd- minus a few bitches and jerks tomorrow night.  I hope the weather is okay.

Hey, if anyone who reads this knows of any single guys, age 20-24, taller than 5'7", into music, the outdoors, and isn't a total stoner... LET me know.  (kinda joking, but if you do know anyone... lol)
Nobody freakin' cares about anybody anymore.  LIFE sucks Ass.  It's the end of the world as we know it.
